name: 3dTwotoComplex
author: AFNI Team
description: Converts 2 sub-bricks of input to a complex-valued dataset

inputs.description: Input dataset (either as 1 dataset with 2 sub-bricks or 2 separate datasets)
inputs.name: Input dataset 1

inputs.description: Second input dataset (optional if 2 sub-bricks in the first dataset)
inputs.name: Input dataset 2

inputs.description: Specify that the 2 inputs are real and imaginary parts [this is the default]
inputs.name: Real and Imaginary parts flag

inputs.description: Specify that the 2 inputs are magnitude and phase [phase is in radians]
inputs.name: Magnitude and Phase flag

inputs.description: Only output nonzero values where the mask dataset is nonzero
inputs.name: Mask Dataset
